name: ai-synthetic-data-generator
title: Agentic Synth - Large-Scale Simulation Engine with Self-Learning AI
description: High-performance simulation engine powered by RuVector. Generate 10,000+ records with TRM/SONA self-learning AI. 18 simulation types (Bloomberg, supply chain, medical, trading). Neural embeddings (5 models). Batch streaming mode. 21 actor integrations.
seoTitle: Agentic Synth - Self-Learning Simulation Engine | RuVector
seoDescription: Large-scale simulation engine with self-learning AI. 18 data types, TRM/SONA neural learning, RuVector embeddings, Bloomberg terminal, supply chain, medical records.

meta.author: rUv
useCases: Self-learning AI that improves data quality over time
Backtest trading algorithms with Bloomberg-style market data
Test supply chain systems with realistic logistics simulations
Generate HIPAA-format medical records for system testing
Load test APIs with streaming batch data
Train AI models with semantically-aware synthetic data
Build RAG knowledge bases with RuVector embeddings
Simulate enterprise workflows with TRM/SONA pattern learning
